name: VR Super Jam - Trash Blaster - Opposites Theme
name_original: VR Super Jam - Trash Blaster - Opposites Theme
description:
Using your trusty Trash Blaster, you must make this dirty world clean by removing all trash and junk from it. Grab upgrades along the way to make your shots more powerful! You can shoot trash from a distance, or get up close and blast at close range, causing different effects.

I've never done a jam this short so I didn't get to do as much as I wanted, but I still am somewhat satisfied with the final outcome.

Might add a more reactive points system in the future, and more dynamic points based on size of trash disposed of.

Assets used:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/grenade-sound-fx-147490

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/electronic/hexapuppies-synthwa...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/essentials/tutorial-projects/unity-particl...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/urban/wasteland-cabin-9486...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/lowpoly-wasteland-props-13...

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/chainlink-fences-73107

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...
